dialogue: They say most people meet their future mates at work.
Now that you are working from home, your odds of mating just turned negative.
You could try using a dating app to find a woman, but then you'd need to rely on your looks.
Your best chance of reproduction has always been to wear down a co-worker over several years.
Women need time to get over your appearance, and to appreciate your inner qualities.
We should have a goodbye party for your genes.
Maybe next time we could walk and not talk.
